name: SerenityPrayer
0:
”Alexa, open serenity prayer”
”recite the serenity prayer”
”Say the serenity prayer”
skdetail:

Developer Terms of Use
des: The Serenity Prayer uses your Alexa to recite the serenity prayer back to you. It is the common prayer used during AA meetings!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
